Container.Name: KeepLocal
Container.Overview:
KeepLocal - A self-hosted notes application inspired by Google Keep.
Features: - User authentication with JWT (secure multi-user support) - Create, edit, and delete notes with confirmation dialogs - Google Keep-style todo lists with checkboxes - Link preview cards with Open Graph metadata - 10 different colors for your notes - Pin/unpin functionality - Tags/categories for better organization - Full-text search in title and content - Dark mode with theme persistence - Keyboard shortcuts (Ctrl+N, Ctrl+F, Ctrl+K) - Responsive design (works on desktop and mobile) - MongoDB database integration - Advanced security (JWT auth, XSS protection, CSRF, CORS, CSP, Rate Limiting) - Toast notifications for better feedback - ARIA labels for accessibility
